name: Telegram Bot
description: Integrate with Telegram Bot to send, send, get and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: Send Message
tools.description: Send a text message via Telegram Bot API. Supports Markdown and HTML formatting.

tools.name: Send Photo
tools.description: Send a photo to a Telegram chat. Provide the chat ID and a URL to the photo.

tools.name: Get Updates
tools.description: Get incoming updates (messages, callbacks, etc.) for the Telegram bot. Use offset to acknowledge previous updates.

tools.name: Get Chat
tools.description: Get information about a Telegram chat (private, group, supergroup, or channel).
